member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_SCALE_SUPPORT
member.summary: Describes the supported scaling range of output sizes for a video scaler.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_SCALE_SUPPORT.OutputSizeRange
member.summary: A structure describing the supported output size range for the scaler.

member.name: D3D12_VIDEO_SCALE_SUPPORT.Flags
member.summary: A member of the enumeration specifying the supported scaling capabilities of the scaler.
